text: Peter Speight (born 26 December 1992) is a British freestyle skier. He competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics finishing 15th. Speight made his World Cup halfpipe debut in 2013 and achieved his career best World Cup finish with a 4th place in China, December 2017.https://www.pyeongchang2018.com/en/game- time/results/OWG2018/en/freestyle-skiing/athlete-profile-n3036539-peter- speight.htm He has won the British championships twice in 2016 and 2017. Born in East London, Speight moved to Sheffield aged 10 where he first took up freestyle skiing at the Sheffield Ski Village. Speight studied History at the [University of Manchester] graduating in 2016. Peter is a supporter of the Peoples Vote campaign. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c1YlAQZTBQo ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Freestyle skiers at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:British male freestyle skiers Category:Olympic freestyle skiers of Great Britain
title: Peter Speight
